summary.span: Provides methods to manage a collection of objects.

span.span: Provides methods to manage a collection of objects.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常使用的其他控制項，例如， ，或。 is typically used by other controls, such as the , , or . 您可以將點陣圖或圖示，而且能夠使用映像，因為它們需要其他控制項。You can add bitmaps or icons to the , and the other controls are able to use the images as they require. 您可以使用控制代碼來管理映像清單。 uses a handle to manage the list of images. 才建立某些作業，例如開始呼叫或，會對映像清單。The is not created until certain operations, such as getting the or calling , are performed on the image list. 執行其他作業，例如，設定或是會導致重新建立。Performing other operations, such as setting the or will cause the to be recreated. 因此，您應該執行這些作業新增至映像之前。Therefore, you should perform these operations before you add images to the . 此外，當您使用將當地語系化的表單時，您應該一律加入和映像，當表單的 [語言] 屬性設定為預設值。In addition, when you work with forms that will be localized, you should always add an and images when the Language property of a form is set to Default. 在您新增映像會損毀應用程式資源檔案之前，請變更表單的語言。Changing the form's language before you add images will corrupt the application resource files. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何選取、 移除和顯示影像。The following code example shows how to select, remove, and display images. [!code-cpp[Classic ImageList Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ImageList Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ImageList Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ImageList Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ImageList Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ImageList Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表顯示的執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of . |項目Item|描述Description| |----------|-----------------| ||在.NET Framework 1.0 版中，預設值是。In the .NET Framework version 1.0, the default is . 在.NET Framework 1.1 或更新版本中，預設值是。In the .NET Framework version 1.1 or later, the default is .| ||預設值是物件，其高度和寬度的 16 x 16。The default is a object with a height and width of 16 by 16.| ||預設值是 。The default value is .| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建構，將影像加入至屬性，並將屬性，並使用方法。The following code example demonstrates constructing an , adding images to the property, setting the property, and using the method. 若要執行此範例中，將它放在包含名為按鈕的表單`Button1`。To run this example, place it in a form containing a button named `Button1`. 此範例假設存在`FeatherTexture.bmp`並`Gone Fishing.bmp`在 c:\Windows\\。The example assumes the existence of `FeatherTexture.bmp` and `Gone Fishing.bmp` at c:\Windows\\. 如果點陣圖不存在於您的系統，或存在於另一個位置，請據此變更的範例。Change the example accordingly if the bitmaps do not exist on your system, or exist at another location. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.HelpProviderAndImageListExample#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpProviderAndImageListExample/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.HelpProviderAndImageListExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpProviderAndImageListExample/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.HelpProviderAndImageListExample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpProviderAndImageListExample/VB/form1.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式可讓您將建立關聯任何物件。The constructor enables you to associate a with any object. 產生關聯像這樣，您交給控制項的存留期至。By associating the like this, you hand over control of the lifetime of the to the . 如果您在應用程式中使用多個元件，而且想要同時處置所有人都可以是很有用。This can be useful if you use a number of components in your application, and want to dispose of all of them simultaneously. 比方說，如果您將建立關聯，則，和具有，則呼叫容器將會強制所有這些元件，也可供使用。For example, if you associate a , an , and a with a , calling on the Container will force disposal of all of these components as well.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您為新的值，設定色彩深度重新建立映像清單。When you set the color depth to a new value, the for the image list is recreated. 因為設定屬性會導致重新建立控制代碼，您應該設定之前設定屬性。Because setting the property causes the handle to be recreated, you should set prior to setting the property. 時的控制代碼建立之後，設定或是屬性在程式碼，在設定之後屬性，會使設定的映像集合要刪除的屬性。When the handle for the has been created, setting the or properties in code, after setting the property, will cause the collection of images set for the property to be deleted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果尚未建立映像集合，它會建立當您擷取這個屬性時。If the image collection has not yet been created, it is created when you retrieve this property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建構，將影像加入至屬性，並將屬性，並使用方法。The following code example demonstrates constructing an , adding images to the property, setting the property, and using the method. 若要執行此範例中，將它放在包含名為按鈕的表單`Button1`。To run this example, place it in a form containing a button named `Button1`. 此範例假設存在`FeatherTexture.bmp`並`Gone Fishing.bmp`在 c:\Windows\\。The example assumes the existence of `FeatherTexture.bmp` and `Gone Fishing.bmp` at c:\Windows\\. 如果點陣圖不存在於您的系統，或存在於另一個位置，請據此變更的範例。Change the example accordingly if the bitmaps do not exist on your system, or exist at another location. summary.span: Gets or sets the size of the images in the image list.

span.span: Gets or sets the size of the images in the image list.

value.span: 所定義的高度和寬度，單位為像素的影像清單中。

span.span: The that defines the height and width, in pixels, of the images in the list.
The default size is 16 by 16.
The maximum size is 256 by 256.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定前將映像新增至映像集合的屬性會導致大小會調整為指定的映像大小的影像。Setting the property prior to adding images to the image collection causes the images to be resized to the image size specified. 當您設定屬性設為新的值，重新建立映像清單。When you set the property to a new value, the for the image list is recreated. 因為設定屬性會導致重新建立控制代碼，您應該設定之前設定屬性。Because setting the property causes the handle to be recreated, you should set prior to setting the property. 時的控制代碼建立之後，設定或是屬性在程式碼，在設定之後屬性，會使設定的映像集合要刪除的屬性。When the handle for the has been created, setting the or properties in code, after setting the property, will cause the collection of images set for the property to be deleted. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建構，將影像加入至屬性，並將屬性，並使用方法。The following code example demonstrates constructing an , adding images to the property, setting the property, and using the method. 若要執行此範例中，將它放在包含名為按鈕的表單`Button1`。To run this example, place it in a form containing a button named `Button1`. 此範例假設存在`FeatherTexture.bmp`並`Gone Fishing.bmp`在 c:\Windows\\。The example assumes the existence of `FeatherTexture.bmp` and `Gone Fishing.bmp` at c:\Windows\\. 如果點陣圖不存在於您的系統，或存在於另一個位置，請據此變更的範例。Change the example accordingly if the bitmaps do not exist on your system, or exist at another location. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.HelpProviderAndImageListExample#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpProviderAndImageListExample/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.HelpProviderAndImageListExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpProviderAndImageListExample/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.HelpProviderAndImageListExample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpProviderAndImageListExample/VB/form1.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是影像清單的資料部分。The is the data portion of the image list. 當您使用將當地語系化的表單時，您永遠都應該加入和映像，當表單的 [語言] 屬性設定為預設值。When you work with forms that will be localized, you should always add an and images when the Language property of a form is set to Default. 在您新增映像會損毀的影像資料流之前，請變更表單的語言。Changing the form's language before you add images will corrupt the image stream. 您可以將此控制代碼傳遞給另一個執行個體。You can pass this handle to another instance of an .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event RecreateHandle As EventHandler

span.span: Occurs when the is recreated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個事件進行特殊處理的時機會重新建立動作，例如變更或。You can use this event to do special processing when the is recreated by actions such as changing the or . 因為設定特殊的處理可能需要或屬性設定後的屬性會導致重新建立控制代碼和捨棄的映像。Special processing may be required because setting the or the property after setting the property causes the handle to be recreated and the images to be discarded. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換具有或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`ImageList1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ImageList1`. 請確定 與關聯的事件處理常式事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#160](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#160)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#160](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#160)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 繪製影像時，則不會呈現為透明的色彩。The transparent color is not rendered when the image is drawn.
